overview: Sweetheart Video's celebrated series, presents Alexis Fawx, in four unique scenes with four of her favourite girls. In this epic film, you will get up close and personal with Alexis and discover the reasons why she has handpicked each girl. This vignette movie showcases the beautiful Alexis and her partners. Starting with a beautiful threesome with Katrina Jade and Whitney Wright. Followed by Ana Foxxx painted in gold and Aidra Fox covered in mud. These three scenes are visually satisfying. Including an incredible sex scene between 2 icons, Angela White and Alexis Fawx. Alexis loves these girls, and it shows!
title: Alexis Loves Girls
